clinical_study.brief_title: Nitazoxanide Pharmacokinetic Parameters in Hepatic Impaired Patients
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Phase 1, Multiple-dose Study to Evaluate the Pharmacokinetics of Nitazoxanide 500 mg Twice Daily for 7 Days in Adult Subjects With Moderate and Severe Hepatic Impairment and Adult Healthy Control Subjects

brief_summary.textblock: This study is being conducted to evaluate the major Nitazoxanide (NTZ) active metabolite in adult participants with hepatic impairment and healthy adults.

detailed_description.textblock: This study is being conducted to assess the effect of hepatic impairment on the pharmacokinetics of the major Nitazoxanide active metabolite in hepatic impaired (moderate and severe according to Child-Pugh categories) and healthy control adults following repeated oral dose administration of NTZ 500 mg twice a day for 7 days.
